TopicTitle: Satellite/Thruster that gives off no thrust

Articles.Content:
:l

I\'m tired of searching the forums/google.

I remember a mod part that\'s essentially a satellite that\'s technically a booster. It\'s small, square like with thrusters shooting off in 6 directions (all opposing each other).

It gives off no thrust, and is only meant to be an easy to see/track satellite.

I do not know who made it, or the name of the part, or what pack it is in.

Please Halp.

That is exactly it.

Ironically I already checked that page, and I almost missed it this time too.

It\'s because the ScreenShot is just a giant ball of flames and I overlooked it.

Thank you
